name: Orbital Tether
description:
This is my very first game! In this simple arcade game you play as two tethered orbs, one red and one blue, that are constantly spinning around one another. Smaller orbs will come flying across the screen. You must collect the same the same colored orbs while avoiding the opposite colors. Go for a high score and thanks for playing! 

Controls:

  • Spacebar - Switch rotation
  • Escape - Quit game

If you enjoy the game or have any improvements you'd like to see, please leave a comment! Thank you once again for trying my first game!
